channel.title: Book Of Jeremiah on ✟ Christian Writings ✟
channel.description: Recent content in Book Of Jeremiah on ✟ Christian Writings ✟

item.title: Jeremiah 1
item.description: v1 The words of Jeremiah the son of Hilkiah, one of the priests who were in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin.

item.title: Jeremiah 2
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Go and proclaim in the ears of Jerusalem, saying, ‘Yahweh says, “I remember for you the kindness of your youth, the love of your weddings; how you went after me in the wilderness, in a land that was not sown.

item.title: Jeremiah 3
item.description: v1 “They say, ‘If a man puts away his wife, and she goes from him, and becomes another man’s, should he return to her again?

item.title: Jeremiah 4
item.description: v1 “If you will return, Israel,” says Yahweh, “if you will return to me, and if you will put away your abominations out of my sight; then you will not be removed;

item.title: Jeremiah 5
item.description: v1 “Run back and forth through the streets of Jerusalem, and see now, and know, and seek in its wide places, if you can find a man, if there is anyone who does justly, who seeks truth, then I will pardon her.

item.title: Jeremiah 6
item.description: v1 “Flee for safety, you children of Benjamin, out of the middle of Jerusalem!

item.title: Jeremiah 7
item.description: v1 The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 8
item.description: v1 “At that time,” says Yahweh, “they will bring the bones of the kings of Judah, the bones of his princes, the bones of the priests, the bones of the prophets, and the bones of the inhabitants of Jerusalem, out of their graves.

item.title: Jeremiah 9
item.description: v1 Oh that my head were waters, and my eyes a spring of tears, that I might weep day and night for the slain of the daughter of my people!

item.title: Jeremiah 10
item.description: v1 Hear the word which Yahweh speaks to you, house of Israel!

item.title: Jeremiah 11
item.description: v1 The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 12
item.description: v1 You are righteous, Yahweh, when I contend with you; yet I would like to reason the cause with you.

item.title: Jeremiah 13
item.description: v1 Yahweh said to me, “Go, and buy yourself a linen belt, and put it on your waist, and don’t put it in water.

item.title: Jeremiah 14
item.description: v1 This is Yahweh’s word that came to Jeremiah concerning the drought.

item.title: Jeremiah 15
item.description: v1 Then Yahweh said to me, “Though Moses and Samuel stood before me, yet my mind would not turn toward this people.

item.title: Jeremiah 16
item.description: v1 Then Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “You shall not take a wife, neither shall you have sons or daughters, in this place.

item.title: Jeremiah 17
item.description: v1 “The sin of Judah is written with a pen of iron, and with the point of a diamond.

item.title: Jeremiah 18
item.description: v1 The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 19
item.description: v1 Thus said Yahweh, “Go, and buy a potter’s earthen container, and take some of the elders of the people, and of the elders of the priests;

item.title: Jeremiah 20
item.description: v1 Now Pashhur, the son of Immer the priest, who was chief officer in Yahweh’s house, heard Jeremiah prophesying these things.

item.title: Jeremiah 21
item.description: v1 The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, when king Zedekiah sent to him Pashhur the son of Malchijah, and Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah, the priest, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 22
item.description: v1 Yahweh said, “Go down to the house of the king of Judah, and speak this word, there:

item.title: Jeremiah 23
item.description: v1 “Woe to the shepherds who destroy and scatter the sheep of my pasture!

item.title: Jeremiah 24
item.description: v1 Yahweh showed me, and behold, two baskets of figs were set before Yahweh’s temple, after Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had carried away captive Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim, king of Judah, and the princes of Judah, with the craftsmen and smiths, from Jerusalem, and had brought them to Babylon.

item.title: Jeremiah 25
item.description: v1 The word that came to Jeremiah concerning all the people of Judah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah (this was the first year of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon),

item.title: Jeremiah 26
item.description: v1 In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, this word came from Yahweh:

item.title: Jeremiah 27
item.description: v1 In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, this word came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 28
item.description: v1 That same year, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the fourth year, in the fifth month, Hananiah the son of Azzur, the prophet, who was of Gibeon, spoke to me in Yahweh’s house, in the presence of the priests and of all the people, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 29
item.description: v1 Now these are the words of the letter that Jeremiah the prophet sent from Jerusalem to the residue of the elders of the captivity, and to the priests, to the prophets, and to all the people whom Nebuchadnezzar had carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon,

item.title: Jeremiah 30
item.description: v1 The word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 31
item.description: v1 “At that time,” says Yahweh, “I will be the God of all the families of Israel, and they will be my people.

item.title: Jeremiah 32
item.description: v1 This is the word that came to Jeremiah from Yahweh in the tenth year of Zedekiah king of Judah, which was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadnezzar.

item.title: Jeremiah 33
item.description: v1 Moreover Yahweh’s word came to Jeremiah the second time, while he was still locked up in the court of the guard, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 34
item.description: v1 The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, when Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, with all his army, all the kingdoms of the earth that were under his dominion, and all the peoples, were fighting against Jerusalem and against all its cities, saying:

item.title: Jeremiah 35
item.description: v1 The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 36
item.description: v1 In the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, this word came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 37
item.description: v1 Zedekiah the son of Josiah reigned as king, instead of Coniah the son of Jehoiakim, whom Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon made king in the land of Judah.

item.title: Jeremiah 38
item.description: v1 Shephatiah the son of Mattan, and Gedaliah the son of Pashhur, and Jucal the son of Shelemiah, and Pashhur the son of Malchijah, heard the words that Jeremiah spoke to all the people, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 39
item.description: v1 In the ninth year of Zedekiah king of Judah, in the tenth month, Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon and all his army came against Jerusalem, and besieged it.

item.title: Jeremiah 40
item.description: v1 The word which came to Jeremiah from Yahweh, after Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard had let him go from Ramah, when he had taken him being bound in chains among all the captives of Jerusalem and Judah, who were carried away captive to Babylon.

item.title: Jeremiah 41
item.description: v1 Now in the seventh month, Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, the son of Elishama, of the royal offspring and one of the chief officers of the king, and ten men with him, came to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam to Mizpah; and there they ate bread together in Mizpah.

item.title: Jeremiah 42
item.description: v1 Then all the captains of the forces, and Johanan the son of Kareah, and Jezaniah the son of Hoshaiah, and all the people from the least even to the greatest, came near,

item.title: Jeremiah 43
item.description: v1 When Jeremiah had finished speaking to all the people all the words of Yahweh their God, with which Yahweh their God had sent him to them, even all these words,

item.title: Jeremiah 44
item.description: v1 The word that came to Jeremiah concerning all the Jews who lived in the land of Egypt, who lived at Migdol, and at Tahpanhes, and at Memphis, and in the country of Pathros, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 45
item.description: v1 The message that Jeremiah the prophet spoke to Baruch the son of Neriah, when he wrote these words in a book at the mouth of Jeremiah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, saying,

item.title: Jeremiah 46
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word which came to Jeremiah the prophet concerning the nations.

item.title: Jeremiah 47
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word that came to Jeremiah the prophet concerning the Philistines, before Pharaoh struck Gaza.

item.title: Jeremiah 48
item.description: v1 Of Moab. Yahweh of Armies, the God of Israel, says: “Woe to Nebo!

item.title: Jeremiah 49
item.description: v1 Of the children of Ammon. Yahweh says: “Has Israel no sons?

item.title: Jeremiah 50
item.description: v1 The word that Yahweh spoke concerning Babylon, concerning the land of the Chaldeans, by Jeremiah the prophet.

item.title: Jeremiah 51
item.description: v1 Yahweh says: “Behold, I will raise up against Babylon, and against those who dwell in Lebkamai, a destroying wind.

item.title: Jeremiah 52
item.description: v1 Zedekiah was twenty-one years old when he began to reign.
